How can I change the color of the ticks in the colorbar and the font color of the title and colorbar in a matplotlib figure? In my code, the title and colorbar ticks and text are visible in 'temp.png' but not in 'temp2.png'. Here is my code:

```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
from numpy.random import randn

fig = plt.figure()
data = np.clip(randn(250,250),-1,1)
cax = plt.imshow(data, interpolation='nearest')
plt.title('my random fig')
plt.colorbar()

# works fine
plt.savefig('temp.png')
# title and colorbar ticks and text hidden
plt.savefig('temp2.png', facecolor="black", edgecolor="none")
```

I would appreciate any help on this matter.

To address the issue of the title and colorbar ticks and text not being visible in `temp2.png` when the background is black, you need to change the color of these elements to make them visible against the dark background. You can do this by setting appropriate properties for the title, colorbar ticks, and labels. Here's how you can modify your code:

```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
from numpy.random import randn

fig = plt.figure()
data = np.clip(randn(250,250),-1,1)
cax = plt.imshow(data, interpolation='nearest')

# Set the title with a white font color
plt.title('my random fig', color='white')

# Create the colorbar
colorbar = plt.colorbar()

# Set the color of the colorbar ticks and labels to white
colorbar.ax.yaxis.set_tick_params(color='white')
plt.setp(plt.getp(colorbar.ax, 'yticklabels'), color='white')

# Save the figure with a black background
plt.savefig('temp2.png', facecolor='black', edgecolor='none')
```

In this code:
- The `color` parameter of `plt.title()` is set to `'white'` to ensure the title is visible against a black background.
- The color of the colorbar ticks is set to white using `colorbar.ax.yaxis.set_tick_params(color='white')`.
- The color of the colorbar labels is set to white using `plt.setp()`.

By adjusting these properties, your title and colorbar text should remain visible in `temp2.png` when saved with a black background.
